response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am excited to present our premium product, which I believe has the potential to significantly enhance your business operations and achieve remarkable results. Given its exceptional capabilities and the unique value it offers, I am offering it to you at an exclusive price of $850,000. This is a special opportunity tailored for you, considering your expertise and the potential impact this product could have on your endeavors. I am confident that with this investment, you will see substantial returns and improvements in efficiency. Please let me know if you would like to discuss this further or if you have any questions about the product's features and benefits.", "product_price": 850000}
